news.title: KI-Boom treibt Speicherpreise: Apple drohen bis zu 57 Dollar Mehrkosten pro iPhone

news.title: Ex-OpenAI-Forscher: Aktuelle KI-Modelle können keine echte Intelligenz erreichen
news.description:
Aktuelle KI-Modelle sind laut Ex-OpenAI-Forscher Jerry Tworek zu fragil für echte Intelligenz. Insbesondere könnten sie sich nicht aus Fehlerketten befreien.

news.title: Snowflake and OpenAI partner to bring frontier intelligence to enterprise data
news.description: OpenAI and Snowflake partner in a $200M agreement to bring frontier intelligence into enterprise data, enabling AI agents and insights directly in Snowflake.

news.title: Introducing the Codex app
news.description: Introducing the Codex app for macOS—a command center for AI coding and software development with multiple agents, parallel workflows, and long-running tasks.

news.title: Nvidia-Chef Jensen Huang nennt kommendes OpenAI-Investment "wahrscheinlich das größte, das wir je getätigt haben"

news.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
news.description: How OpenAI built an in-house AI data agent that uses GPT-5, Codex, and memory to reason over massive datasets and deliver reliable insights in minutes.

news.title: Taisei Corporation shapes the next generation of talent with ChatGPT
news.description: Taisei Corporation uses ChatGPT Enterprise to support HR-led talent development and scale generative AI across its global construction business.

news.title: Towards a science of scaling agent systems: When and why agent systems work
